title: Marilyn's Christmas Surprise
description: A brand new festive short love story for the holiday season.Thirty years old, single and hard working - Marilyn never seems to have the time for romance or relationships. That is until her actress sister brings the CEO of Charles Industries to the family Christmas, as yet another potential fianc√©. Marilyn can't believe the instant raw magnetism between Brett Charles and herself - but her sister seems oblivious. Is the attraction mutual? Marilyn would never hurt her sister, and couldn't possibly have a relationship with a cheat - or could she...?
author: Alyssa Lindsey
